page.title: 11Monimail/
page.content: The hamlet of Monimail has 8 houses with a total of 25 people. There are 2 farms; Pathcondie, and Sunnybrae which is quite small. Monimail Parish Kirk is situated between Letham and Monimail. It was built in 1792 and seats 500 people. An important feature is the laird's gallery. It was meant for the Melville family who paid for the building of the church. Recently the church was redecorated, carpets were laid, and new lighting was installed. The present minister, the Rev. C. Strong, is our School chaplain. There is a very old churchyard, no longer in use, and remains of a previous church.
